title: Tim Hosler: Investment Banker and Unorthodox Thinker
description: Saint Louis Investment Banker Tim Hosler discusses unorthodox solutions to financial and political problems after Too Big to Fail and the latest election.
content:encoded: Tim Hosler is a Saint Louis investment banker, former CEO and a finance expert whose ideas are unorthodox and clever.Â  At times he has gone head to head with Warren Buffett, and is willing to offer ideas that will ruffle feathers.
author: Vance Crowe
summary: Saint Louis Investment Banker Tim Hosler discusses unorthodox solutions to financial and political problems after Too Big to Fail and the latest election.
subtitle: Saint Louis Investment Banker Tim Hosler discusses unorthodox solutions to financial and political problems after Too Big to Fail and the latest election.
keywords: Saint Louis, Finance, Too Big To Fail, politics, Venture Capital
